item.description:
Looking for something to do over Memorial Day weekend?

Join us for a game night and potluck at Karen and TJ's place. 

There will be some games but please bring your favorite along with a potluck entree, dessert or drink for 6 to 8 people. 

When turning into the parking lot, Karen and TJ's building is on the far left.  They are hosting us in their condo's community function room.  It's a very nice room with lots of space but the kitchen area is small and there is no stove or microwave -so, we won't be able to heat anything up there by those means.  But, there are plenty of outlets along the counter for hot plates and crock pots.
item.name: Game Night and Potluck
